subtitle: This is a good vegetable accompaniment for simply cooked meat and fish.

method.text: Put the water, vinegar, oil and soy sauce into a saucepan or deep frying pan. Bring the liquid to the boil.
Add the carrots and a little seasoning. Simmer for 10 min, without covering the pan, as the liquid should gradually evaporate during cooking.
Add the honey and stir well to blend with the other ingredients. Cook for 5 min.
Serve with the small amount of liquid that remains.

title: Sweet and sour carrots
